name: Be brave, run away!
objective:
These two ogres are after you. Get rid of them before they catch up with you.

%%icon mdi mdi-information-outline$%% Use the %%icon icon-switch$%% switches to disable/enable the %%icon icon-spikes$%% spikes.
boss_tell:
Run! Run! Run, little thing!
Let's see who's the fastest!
